description:
Tested on Revision 807.

If I run euca-get-ajax-console command, then it returns Unknown error.

There is an issue in the exception block of the get_open_port() method.
title: euca-get-ajax-console raises unknown exception

comments.content:
Tested on Revision 807.

If I run euca-get-ajax-console command, then it returns Unknown error.

There is an issue in the exception block of the get_open_port() method.
